content: Lifetime countdown begins at the file creation date. Some files in this room exceed the proposed lifetime and will be deleted once you enable the setting.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message informing users that files exceeding their proposed lifetime will be deleted once the setting is enabled. It appears in a modal dialog, specifically in the body of a LifetimeDialog component. The translated text should provide a clear explanation for the user's action and its consequences.

usage.context:
<ModalDialog isLoading={!tReady} visible={visible} onClose={onClose}>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("Common:Warning")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <StyledBodyContent className="modal-dialog-content-body">
 <Text fontWeight={600} fontSize="13px">
 {t("Files:LifetimeDialogDescriptionHeader")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="13px">{t("Files:LifetimeDialogDescription")}</Text>
 </StyledBodyContent>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "العمر المقترح" (al-'umr al-muqtah) translates to 'suggested age' which is a bit awkward in this context. It implies files have an age rather than a lifetime. A more accurate translation for 'proposed lifetime' would be something like 'المدة المقترحة' (al-mudda al-muqtaraḥa) meaning 'proposed duration'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'العمر المقترح' with 'المدة المقترحة'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Lifetime countdown begins at the file creation date" is not accurately translated. "Lifetime" in this context refers to the duration of file retention, not the 'lifetime' of the file itself. A better translation would focus on the retention period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: "Faylın saxlanma müddəti faylın yaradılması tarixindən başlayır"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Some files in this room exceed the proposed lifetime" is awkwardly translated. The word 'room' implies a physical location, which is not necessarily the intent of the original English. The proposed lifetime should be clarified as a limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: “Bu otaqdakı bəzi faylların saxlanma müddəti məhdudiyyəti aşır”

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English word 'setting' is translated as 'parametri'. While 'parametr' is a valid word, 'parametr' in this context might be confusing to the user. It’s better to use a word closer to 'feature' or 'option'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: “parametrin aktivləşdirilməsi” could be improved to “funksiyanın aktivləşdirilməsi” or “seçimin aktivləşdirilməsi”.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Lifetime countdown' is translated as 'Обратното броене на целия живот'. While technically correct, it's a very literal translation. A more natural Bulgarian phrasing would better convey the intended meaning of 'lifetime' in this context, which refers to the file's retention period. It's a bit awkward in the Bulgarian version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing 'Обратното броене на целия живот' to something like 'Срок на валидност' or 'Продължителност на съхранение' to better reflect the file retention period.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'съхранение' could be more appropriately expressed as 'запазване' considering the context of file deletion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'съхранение' with 'запазване'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'proposed lifetime' isn't accurately reflected in the Czech translation. 'Navrhovaná doba životnosti' is a bit literal and could be misinterpreted. A more natural phrasing might convey 'suggested lifespan' or 'expected duration'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'doporučená životnost' or 'předpokládaná doba trvání' instead of 'navrhovaná doba životnosti'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Lifetime countdown" is not accurately translated. 'Conto alla rovescia della durata' is a bit literal and clunky. A more natural translation would be 'Durata residua' or 'Tempo rimanente'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Durata residua inizia alla data di creazione del file.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "this room" is unnecessarily literal.  It's unclear what room is being referred to.  A better phrasing would be more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alcuni file in questo spazio superano la durata proposta...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'impostazione' could be more precise. It's a generic term for 'setting.' A more accurate term in this context might be 'funzione' or 'opzione'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: una volta abilitata la funzione.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "proposed lifetime" is not accurately translated. "ສະເໜີ" implies a suggestion or proposal, rather than the intended meaning of a predefined or set duration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more precise translation like "ໄລຍະເວລາທີ່ກຳນົດໄວ້" (predefined duration) or "ໄລຍະເວລາທີ່ວາງໄວ້" (set duration).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Lifetime countdown" is translated as "Odliczanie okresu ważności". While not incorrect, "okres ważności" (validity period) is less precise than "żywotność" (lifetime) which is more closely aligned with the English meaning. "Odliczanie żywotności" would be a closer equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odliczanie żywotności rozpoczyna się w dniu utworzenia pliku.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "exceed the proposed lifetime" is translated as "przekroczyły swój okres ważności". While understandable, it's less precise. "Przekroczyły ustalony czas życia" or "przekroczyły dopuszczalną żywotność" would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Niektóre pliki w tym pokoju przekroczyły ustalony czas życia i zostaną usunięte po włączeniu ustawienia.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Lifetime countdown' is translated as 'contagem regressiva vitalícia'. While 'vitalícia' technically means 'lifetime', in this context, it's overly formal and doesn't convey the intended meaning as easily as a simpler alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A contagem regressiva da duração começa na data de criação do arquivo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'proposed lifetime' is translated as 'tempo de vida proposto'. While accurate, it might be clearer to use a more natural-sounding expression.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A duração proposta

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Durata de viață a unor fișierelor este mai mică decât durata de viață propusă" is an awkward and potentially inaccurate translation of "Some files in this room exceed the proposed lifetime". It implies the files *have* a shorter lifetime, when the original text means they *exceed* the limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Durata de viață a unora dintre fișiere depășește durata de viață propusă.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Durata de viață a unora dintre fișiere depășește durata de viață propusă. Astfel aceste fișiere vor fi șterse după activarea acestei setări." is slightly disjointed. The 'Astfel' feels tacked on.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Durata de viață a unora dintre fișiere depășește durata de viață propusă, iar aceste fișiere vor fi șterse după activarea acestei setări.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels a bit fragmented. Combining the sentences for better flow would be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Durata de viață a unora dintre fișiere depășește durata de viață propusă, iar aceste fișiere vor fi șterse după activarea acestei setări.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Some files in this room exceed the proposed lifetime" is not accurately translated. "Предлагаемого срока действия" literally translates to 'of the proposed validity period' which is a bit awkward and doesn't quite convey the meaning of exceeding the lifetime.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Some alternatives include: "Некоторые файлы в этой комнате старше предлагаемого срока действия." (Some files in this room are older than the proposed validity period.) or "Некоторые файлы в этой комнате существуют дольше установленного срока действия." (Some files in this room exist longer than the established validity period.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Lifetime countdown begins' is not accurately conveyed. 'Jeewitha kaalaya adu wima arambawa we' literally translates to 'life time decreases begins'. A better translation might focus on a countdown starting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ගොනුවේ නිර්මාණය වූ දිනයෙන් කාල සීමාව අඩු වීම ආරම්භ වේ. (Gonuwe nirmaniya vuda dinayan kaala seema adu wima arambawa we.) - 'Lifetime limit begins with the file creation date.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'some' is translated as 'samaahara'. While accurate, 'kaakshthiyaa' (certain) could be more appropriate in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කාමරයේ ඇති කෙසෙත්ම ගොනු යෝජිත ජීවිත කාලය ඉක්මවා ඇති අතර, ඔබ සැකසුම ක්‍රියාත්මක කළ පසු ඒවා මකා දැමෙනු ඇත. (Mema kamaraye athi kesthama gonu yogeetha jeewitha kaalaya ikmawa athi ankara oba sekasuma kryaathmak kala pasu evva maka damenu ath.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "doba používania" (time of use) in the Slovak translation is not the most natural way to convey "lifetime" in this context. It's a bit literal. A more accurate and natural translation would be something like "životnosť".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odpočítavanie životnosti sa začína od dátumu vytvorenia súboru.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vymazané' (deleted) is correct but could be refined for better flow and clarity. A slightly more polished phrasing could use 'zmazané'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: po zapnutí tohto nastavenia tieto súbory budú zmazané.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "predlagano življenjsko dobo" could be more naturally translated as something like "predvideno življenjsko dobo" or "določeno življenjsko dobo" to better convey the intended meaning of a proposed or specified lifetime.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odštevanje življenjske dobe se začne z datumom ustvarjanja datoteke. Nekatere datoteke v tej sobi presegajo določeno/predvideno življenjsko dobo in bodo izbrisane, ko to omogočite v nastavitvah.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "век" (vek) which translates to "age" or "era" is used for "lifetime" which is inaccurate in this context. It implies a long period, not the duration of file validity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use a more precise term like "трајање" (trajanje) which means "duration" or "lifetime".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "омогућите ову поставку" is a bit clunky. It translates literally to 'enable this setting'. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "када укључите ову поставку" (when you activate this setting) or simply "када укључите подешавање" (when you activate the setting).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fajla' is a misspelling of 'fajla' in the sentence 'Vek trajanja počinje od datuma kreiranja fajla.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vek trajanja počinje od datuma kreiranja fajla.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The preposition 'u' is followed by 'ovoj', which should be 'ovoj'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Neki fajlovi u ovoj sobi...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Lifetime countdown begins at the file creation date' is translated as 'Vek trajanja počinje od datuma kreiranja fajla'. While understandable, a more natural-sounding translation might be 'Trajanje važenja počinje...' or 'Rok trajanja počinje...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rok trajanja počinje od datuma kreiranja fajla.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Some files in this room' is not accurately translated. 'Bu odadaki' literally translates to 'in this room', which might be too literal and not convey the intended meaning of files within a specific location or context in the system. It's better to convey the concept of files within a defined scope.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu alandaki (in this area/scope) or Bu kapsamdaki (in this scope)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Lifetime countdown" is translated as "Зворотний відлік періоду існування". While technically correct, it's a bit verbose and awkward in Ukrainian. A more natural translation would be something like "Термін дії" or "Час життя".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Термін дії починається в день створення файлу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "exceed the proposed lifetime" is translated as "перевищив встановлений". "Встановлений" (established) isn't quite the right nuance here. It implies a manually set lifetime, whereas the English suggests a pre-defined or proposed one.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: перевищує запропонований термін дії

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the same flow and conciseness as the original English. The sentence structure is slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to improve readability and flow, such as: "Термін дії починається з дати створення файлу. Деякі файли у цій кімнаті мають термін дії, що перевищує запропонований, і будуть видалені після активації налаштування."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Lifetime countdown" is translated as "Đếm ngược thời gian tồn tại". While understandable, "thời gian tồn tại" is a bit verbose. A more natural translation for 'Lifetime' in this context would be 'thời hạn'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đếm ngược thời hạn bắt đầu vào ngày tạo tập tin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'proposed lifetime' is translated as 'thời gian tồn tại đề xuất'. 'Đề xuất' feels somewhat formal and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning. It would be better to indicate it's a maximum or suggested limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Một số tập tin trong phòng này vượt quá thời hạn tồn tại tối đa được đề xuất.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is grammatically correct but could benefit from slightly smoother wording for better flow and readability. The current phrasing feels a little stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đếm ngược thời hạn bắt đầu từ ngày tạo tập tin. Một số tập tin trong phòng này có thời hạn tồn tại vượt quá giới hạn đề xuất và sẽ bị xóa sau khi bạn kích hoạt cài đặt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "proposed lifetime" is translated as "建议有效期". While technically correct, it sounds a bit formal and less natural in this context. A more conversational and user-friendly translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 超过设定的有效期 (Chao guo she ding de you xiao qi)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '在此房间中' (in this room) could be shortened to '此房间' (this room) for better flow, as the context already implies it's referring to the current room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 此房间超过设定的有效期 (Ci fang jian chao guo she ding de you xiao qi)
